course-not-found-description: The course you are looking for does not exist. Please try again with a different course.
course-content-description: We've fine-tuned our course content with hundreds of job positions to prepare you for a successful entry into tech.
join-cohort-description: Join now and start your coding journey today
sign-up-to-plus-description: Subscribe and get access to hundreds of  challenges, projects and courses
create-account-text: Create an account and start your coding journey today
pricing-title: Get access to all of our learning database, courses, and services
pricing-subtitle: Earn a new skills every 30 min, never get stuck or lost again.

course-default-bullets.text: Build your portfolio with hundreds real-world projects
Thousands of and cloud-based coding challenges (no setup needed)
You will never be stuck or alone again, our AI knows who you are
Earn certificates from a USA certified school by the florida department of education

build-connector.description: When learning at your own pace, having access to video tutorials, code examples, and continuous, real-time feedback is crucial to succeed. The tasks you'll tackle will closely resemble those encountered in a real-world tech position. Here's a glimpse of what you'll be working on:

why-learn-4geeks-connector.benefits-connector: Learning at your own pace can be challenging, but we've developed the tools to keep you motivated, prevent you from getting stuck on problems, and accelerate your learning process.

show-prices.title: Get access to all of our learning database, courses, and services
show-prices.description: Earn a new skills every 30 min, never get stuck or lost again.

rigobot.title: Meet Rigobot, our internal AI designed for solo learners
rigobot.description: 4Geeks.com is the first platform designed to maximize learning at your own pace. Join live sessions whenever you can, get help immediately with AI, and ask for one-on-one mentorships. All our content is fully interactive and video-enabled.
rigobot.message: Is there anything you want to know about the {{title}} program?
rigobot.payment-methods: - Credit Card. - Contact support for other options

reviews.name: Felipe Cespedes

reviews.name: Rubi Rimache
reviews.review: I love the program, it's very good and comfortable! I would recommend it for its comfort and the clarity with which things are explained.

featured-bullets.title: As little as 30 minutes every day will take you to full mastery within months.
Build your portfolio with real-world projects and cloud-based challenges (no setup needed).
Our AI knows who you are, reads your code and gives you live feedback as you code. You will never be stuck again.

why-learn-with-4geeks.title: Why should I learn with
why-learn-with-4geeks.description: Join a proven leader in tech education: Over 9 years of recognized excellence, 4000+ successful graduates, 84% job placement rate!

data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.title: Will I be learning on my own?
data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.description: You’ll learn at your own pace within the Data Science & Machine Learning (Self-Paced) track, but you won’t be alone. Join optional live workshops (Python, Pandas, SQL, scikit-learn, model evaluation), book 1:1 mentorships for debugging notebooks or clarifying ML concepts, and get instant AI feedback (Rigobot) on your data pipelines and models.

data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.description: From your dashboard, choose Mentorships → pick a mentor with DS/ML expertise → select the time. Use sessions for topics like feature engineering, cross-validation, hyperparameter tuning, or deploying models. More details here.

data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.description: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits you.

data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], reviews your notebooks, tests your ML pipelines, and suggests fixes. You also get exercise assistance, peer support in Slack, and live workshops on topics like SQL joins, pipeline design, and model deployment.

data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
data-science-and-machine-learning-selfpa.description: No prior DS/ML required. We start with Python fundamentals and basic statistics, then move into Pandas, SQL, and scikit-learn before advanced topics like model tuning and deployment.

back-end-development-with-python.title: Will I be learning on my own?
back-end-development-with-python.description: It’s self-paced, but not solo. In Back-End Development with Python you can jump into optional live workshops (APIs, FastAPI/Flask, databases), get 1:1 mentoring for debugging endpoints, and AI feedback on routes, schemas, and tests.

back-end-development-with-python.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
back-end-development-with-python.description: Go to the dashboard → Mentorships → pick a back-end mentor → choose the time. Perfect for help with REST design, auth (JWT), Docker, or database modeling. Learn more here.

back-end-development-with-python.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
back-end-development-with-python.description: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits you.

back-end-development-with-python.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
back-end-development-with-python.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], analyzes your Python code, runs tests on endpoints, and flags anti-patterns. You’ll also have exercises, project checklists, Slack channels for quick help, and weekly live API/code reviews.

back-end-development-with-python.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
back-end-development-with-python.description: No prior back-end experience required. We start from Python basics and gradually add HTTP, CRUD, auth, SQL/NoSQL, and deployment workflows.

fullstack-development-self-paced.title: Will I be learning on my own?
fullstack-development-self-paced.description: You set the pace in Full-Stack Development (Self-Paced), but you’ll have optional live workshops for HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases. Book 1:1 mentorships anytime and get instant AI feedback on frontend and backend code.

fullstack-development-self-paced.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
fullstack-development-self-paced.description: From your dashboard choose Mentorships → select a full-stack mentor → pick a time. Use sessions for React state, API integration, component design, or Node/Express routes. Details here.

fullstack-development-self-paced.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
fullstack-development-self-paced.description: 45 minutes with an expert reviewing your UI, API, database, or deployment. Share your repo, get code reviews, performance tips, and a roadmap for your next milestone.

fullstack-development-self-paced.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
fullstack-development-self-paced.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], reads your components and endpoints, runs tests, and suggests fixes. You’ll have exercises, real projects, Slack help channels, and weekly live code-alongs to keep you moving.

fullstack-development-self-paced.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
fullstack-development-self-paced.description: No. We begin with fundamentals (web, Git, HTML/CSS, JS) and scale up to React, APIs, databases, and deployment.

applied-ai.title: Will I be learning on my own?
applied-ai.description: Applied AI is self-paced with support. Join optional live sessions (LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG, vector databases), schedule 1:1 mentorships for model integration, and get AI feedback on your prompts and pipelines.

applied-ai.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
applied-ai.description: Dashboard → Mentorships → pick an AI mentor → choose a time. Ideal for prompt strategy, retrieval design, evaluation frameworks, or API integration. More info here.

applied-ai.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
applied-ai.description: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits you.

applied-ai.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
applied-ai.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], critiques prompts, tests your chains, and flags context/format issues. You’ll also get exercises, project templates, Slack support, and weekly live demos on real-world AI use cases.

applied-ai.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
applied-ai.description: No strict prerequisites. Basic Python/JS helps, but the course introduces LLM concepts, APIs, embeddings, and evaluation from scratch.

hack-30-machines-in-30-days.title: Will I be learning on my own?
hack-30-machines-in-30-days.description: It’s self-paced with constant support. In Hack 30 Machines in 30 Days you can join optional live labs, book 1:1 mentorships for walkthroughs and methodology, and get AI hints on enumeration and exploitation steps—always in safe, legal lab environments.

hack-30-machines-in-30-days.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
hack-30-machines-in-30-days.description: Dashboard → Mentorships → choose a cybersecurity mentor → select time. Great for planning attack paths, tool usage (nmap, gobuster, Burp), or post-exploitation. Read more here.

hack-30-machines-in-30-days.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
hack-30-machines-in-30-days.description: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits you.

hack-30-machines-in-30-days.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
hack-30-machines-in-30-days.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], suggests next steps, common misconfig checks, and report structure. You’ll use Slack for quick help and attend weekly live debriefs on selected machines. All practice is in controlled labs—no real-world targets.

hack-30-machines-in-30-days.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
hack-30-machines-in-30-days.description: Basic Linux/CLI comfort helps, but we start with fundamentals: networking, enumeration, web vulns (OWASP), and safe tooling. Ethics and legality are reinforced throughout.

vibe-coding-with-ai.title: Will I be learning on my own?
vibe-coding-with-ai.description: Yes—at your own rhythm, with support. In Vibe Coding with AI you get optional live creative sessions, 1:1 mentorships for project ideas, and AI feedback on your code, prompts, and experiments.

vibe-coding-with-ai.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
vibe-coding-with-ai.description: Use the dashboard → Mentorships → pick a mentor → choose time. Perfect for brainstorming, prototyping with AI, or unblocking a fun weekend build. Details here.

vibe-coding-with-ai.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
vibe-coding-with-ai.description: One-on-one mentoring sessions are 45-minute meetings between you and an expert mentor, where you can ask all the questions related to problems you have on your code, or concepts you don't understand, about almost any technology, and at the day and time that best fits you.

vibe-coding-with-ai.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
vibe-coding-with-ai.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], reviews code and prompts, suggests small wins, and helps you iterate quickly. Plus Slack channels, weekly showcases, and templates to remix.

vibe-coding-with-ai.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
vibe-coding-with-ai.description: No. We start with beginner-friendly exercises and layer on coding + AI techniques as you go.

deep-dive-into-python.title: Will I be learning on my own?
deep-dive-into-python.description: Deep Dive into Python is self-paced with strong support. Join optional live workshops (OOP, typing, async, packaging), book 1:1 mentorships for code reviews, and get AI feedback on style, complexity, and tests.

deep-dive-into-python.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
deep-dive-into-python.description: Dashboard → Mentorships → pick a Python mentor → select time. Great for refactoring, performance, concurrency (asyncio), and packaging/publishing. More info here.

deep-dive-into-python.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
deep-dive-into-python.description: 45 minutes of deep code review: idiomatic Python, testing (pytest), type hints, design patterns, and architecture tips. Bring your repo and questions.

deep-dive-into-python.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
deep-dive-into-python.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], runs tests, flags smells, and suggests idiomatic fixes. You’ll also have advanced exercises, Slack help, and weekly live code-alongs.

deep-dive-into-python.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
deep-dive-into-python.description: No! (even though some Python basics are helpful) we quickly revisit fundamentals, then go deep into advanced language features and best practices.

change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.title: Will I be learning on my own?
change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.description: Yes, but with guidance. In Change Your Career in 15 Days (Self-Paced) you’ll follow a focused roadmap with optional live check-ins, 1:1 mentorships for rapid feedback, and AI support to keep momentum high.

change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.title: How do I schedule a mentoring session?
change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.description: Open the dashboard → Mentorships → select a mentor → choose the time. Use sessions to validate your plan, polish your first portfolio piece, and prepare for mock interviews. Details here.

change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.title: What are one-on-one mentoring sessions?
change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.description: 45 minutes focused on outcomes: goal setting, learning strategy, portfolio scope, and interview practice. Mentors help you prioritize and ship quickly.

change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.title: What other kind of support do I get when learning?
change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.description: Rigobot, (your AI Tutor)[https://4geeksacademy.com/us/ai-powered-learning/rigobot-ai-coding-mentor], gives instant feedback on tasks, projects, and written reflections. You’ll also get Slack accountability, short daily challenges, and optional live sprint reviews.

change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.title: Do I need prior knowledge?
change-your-career-in-15-days-self-paced.description: No. This sprint is beginner-friendly and designed to build foundations fast while producing a tangible project and a clear next-steps plan.

what-is-learnpack.title: Maximize Your Learning Potential with LearnPack!
what-is-learnpack.description: LearnPack is our custom-designed software for self-learners. It integrates our proprietary AI tutor, ready to address any coding-related issues and equipped with automated tests for immediate feedback, allowing for an interactive learning experience anytime!

list.title: Learn with AI
list.description: Our AI reviews your code to give you instant feedback, helps with the exercises, and more!

list.title: One-on-one mentoring sessions
list.description: Access a pack of monthly mentorship sessions with our experts and add extra sessions as needed.

list.title: Learn with the community
list.description: Learning alongside others is not only more fun but also helps you progress faster. Join our active learning community for support and collaboration.

certificate.title: Get certified in your favorite technology
certificate.description: Your 4Geeks certificate will open doors to professional opportunities with our extensive network of companies across the world. Endorsed by international institutions, it represents a globally recognized standard, unlocking diverse career paths.

havent-decided.title: You can try 4Geeks on a free plan
havent-decided.description: We have a free plan for you, with it you can enjoy many of our benefits, including a free feedback session.

job-section.title: Get an exclusive 20% discount on Beyond the Resume
job-section.subtitle: Improve your CV, portfolio, GitHub profile, and social media profiles.
job-section.description: Earn an exclusive discount on Beyond the Resume after completing the course, a program designed to help you with career topics, from optimizing your professional profile to excelling in interviews.
